login.title: Welcome
login.description: Log in to ${companyName} to continue to ${clientName}.

signup.invalid-username: Mobile # can only contain alphanumeric characters or: '${characters}'. Mobile # should have between ${min} and ${max} characters.
signup.invalid-username-max-length: The mobile # must not be longer than ${max} characters.
signup.invalid-username-min-length: The mobile # must have at least ${min} characters.
signup.invalid-username-email-not-allowed: The mobile # cannot be an email.
signup.username-taken: The mobile # provided is in use already.
